website_summaries.verdict: 3-product acne treatment kit including cleanser, Clearing Serum, and "Synergyzer" to treat acne using salicylic acid, mandelic acid, and nitric oxide.
pros: This kit really works for the majority of users
The formulation not only works on acne lesions including cystic acne, but helps to minimize old acne scars, fade dark spots, and correct uneven skin tone
Can't beat the 100% money back guarantee if users are not satisfied!
cons: As expected with any product of this type, a few people didn't get the results they desired

customer_reviews.title: Really effective
customer_reviews.text: I always had acne since I was a teenager. I tried so many different acne treatments products. Most of them didn't work, some of them only worked for the first few weeks and my acne just came back like before. This product is the only one that seems effective for a long time. It helped me clear about 70% of my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Tuong Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! I’ve been using it for 2 years and have no complaints. My skin is sensitive and has no issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: teshe'

customer_reviews.title: Neutralyze Moderate To Severe Acne Treatment Kit
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be working well right off the bat, reducing redness and easy to use :)
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just using it for few weeks to see result.
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing product treatment for acne. Unbelievable much than I expected, because I have had issues on my face by acne, now 80% was gone after I used these products. I highly recommended for this treatment.
customer_reviews.author: KIMEAM EANG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for some time and have actually been surprised at how well it works. I heard good things and know that certain products only work for certain skin types, but this one worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price and the results! My skin isn’t perfect but it has improved so much since starting to use the neutralize system.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out my skin
customer_reviews.text: I was using prescription wash and cream for my skin prior to using this product. And it dried my skin really bad. I haven't had any problem with this product drying my skin. Doesn't burn, very gentle on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Qbee

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far it has helped. It's been a few weeks and my skin is clearer. Not completely gone but I think it's noticeable. I also bought the moisturizing cream for a 4th step. Makes it look even better
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Magic to my teenaged active athlete
customer_reviews.text: My multi-sport athlete battled acne, especially during football season. Not happy about returning to school with bumps all over his face he tried Neutralyze products and is loving it! Acne that does develope disappears quickly, the system is easy to use, and he definitely has more confidence with his clear skin. To date, best acne product I've purchased for any of my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product really works fast!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well. My teenager has been using it for a few months now and it has made a big difference in his complexion.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the system twice a day for about 2 weeks. My skin is much cleaner, smoother and clearer. My skin is much less oily without being tight and overly dry. My pores have shrunk considerably. I wish this was around when I was younger!
customer_reviews.author: Elise O.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it is working as soon as you put it on!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery very fast!!! Really improving my skin, have only used a few times but so far I love it! I will post a picture in a few weeks to show progress!
customer_reviews.author: Minarski

customer_reviews.title: Best Product I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used Neutralyze for a over a week and my skin has change dramatically. I had small red acne bumps all over and my pores were enlarged, I am 43 and my skin took a turn for the worse. This product has not only cleared all the bumps but the pores are shrunk again as well. This product is the best I cannot stop telling my friends about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These products have worked amazing for me. I have had amazing skin until I turned 40! Now at 47 I have tried tons of products for my hormonal cystic acne. I am especially bad around my chin and neck. Everything I tried dried out my skin so bad. I looked like a had a peeling sunburn all the time and make up looked terrible over that! Neutralze has not only made a Tremendous difference in the severity of breakouts but has changed the texture of my overall skin in a very positive way. I am a very happy consumer and urge anyone to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions and it works great!!!  👏👏👏👏
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that has worked for my son. We almost gave up on it...he struggled with sticking to the steps. But once he followed the instructions it worked great!!! 😁.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Anne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Both of my teenage sons have been using this for months. It has made a huge difference in their complexion and almost completely eliminated breakouts! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Adult acne = OMG! This stuff works, that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Adult acne = OMG! This stuff works, that's it, it works so try it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Pavone

customer_reviews.title: Works well for adult acne
customer_reviews.text: A very easy to use 3 step system that didn’t irritate my skin or dry it out. I followed the instructions and used both morning and night for almost a week now and I’m already noticing my skin looking better. First few days I had more breakouts but that’s to be expected as I think it was brining everything to the surface, last couple of days the redness is going down and I’ve got noticeably fewer spots. Excited to see the results after longer use and think it’s great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: cleared up my face!
customer_reviews.text: have been having some hormonal imbalances, and i started using this system, and it has dramatically made the difference in my skin and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 daughters have been using this product for 3 years after trying all acne product even doctors prescriptions. Nothing works Neutralyze is the only one that help them.
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Fast results!
customer_reviews.text: After 1 day of using it in the am and pm I noticed a drastic difference in my acne. Doesn’t leave your skin greasy feeling! I will be re ordering this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the ONLY thing that worked for my tween daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hit puberty and her ace immediately broke out in terrible acne. She has naturally oily skin and hair. I tried everything on her acne. Even prescription creams but nothing worked. So I ordered this just to see and it’s amazing. Just a few days of using this consistently makes such a joticeable difference. She still has a few bumps but the redness and puss and all of that is gone. It looks a thousand times better.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my adult acne
customer_reviews.text: I have used tons of other products and acne systems and this has been the only one to work. It is all lightweight once on with no harsh fragrances. It also did not dry out my skin or cause irritation like other products. This is the only thing that has made a difference in my adult acne.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: WOW.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these products for a few months now, and it's the only thing that has worked on my chronic acne. I have dermatillomania, so it was essential for me to heal my face so I wouldn't pick at scabs and risk deadly infection. I have dry, sensitive skin and this didn't aggravate it at all. I washed my face with the face was 2x a day, morning and night, and applied the gels at night before bed. I noticed redness diminish practically overnight, but my face was incredibly inflamed, so your mileage may vary. I will continue to keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Linley

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care seat
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it is really helpful It minimizes the appearance of acne scars This the 3rd time i reorder it.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days and I can already tell a huge difference.

customer_reviews.title: My Great Acne Kit
customer_reviews.text: First two weeks were a little rough - my acne got a bit worse and it had already been acting up before I bought the kit. But I’m about 2 months in now and my acne has cleared up significantly! Little pricey but I’m not having to spot treat as much or deal with as much acne. If you’re struggling with choosing a kit try this one - but give it time!
customer_reviews.author: SavvySav

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No results. Very disappointed. 2 weeks using religiously and my acne is still as bad as it was. No improvement at all.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Results
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son used this product to treat pretty bad acne. His complexion has cleared significantly!

customer_reviews.text: Works amazing from the very first use!! Doesn't dry my face out like normal face wash. Took all the redness out of my face instantly.

customer_reviews.text: This product has cleared my face when nothing else could! I started seeing a change within days! I have had acne problems from teens and now ending my 20s with skin I love! Absolutely recommend this product!

customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keeps me from getting those terrible cyst like break outs that take forever to heal. My skin looks great since I started, I will continue for sure.

customer_reviews.text: This was a very good product. It works well and effects were shown as little as 3 weeks! I would recommend this to anyone seeking a good face wash.

customer_reviews.text: This system has done amazing things for my hormonal acne. The only thing that has worked to clear my skin. And it worked within a week

customer_reviews.title: Working well on sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this for a little over a week now and we see big improvements on her skin. She has some bumps on her forehead that have decreased a lot in the last few days. We have tried so many different products and so many are harsh on her skin and she has had no skin irritation so far. This price also works for us.
customer_reviews.author: K Carbo

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, leaves your face feeling clean and soft after each use. Make sure you use it every morning and evening! But for some reason I still get boil pimples. Like the one in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Most effective acne treatment
customer_reviews.text: I just started using Neutralyze Anti-Acne Solution for a week and I already see the difference before using it. I occasionally have acne but when I do it's bad so I tried every product in the drugstore but only to find this online that actually works! My skin never felt clearer and fresher. I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: It really works for me, from the first day of use, notice the change
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lemeque

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: Not for us. My 16 year old son has been using this product for over a month. He switched from Proactive to this stuff and it made his acne worse. We initially made the switch to be more cost effective and to find something less harsh on the skin. But after a month of using it and having terrible breakouts, he is back to using proactive and his face cleared up within days.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: This was just before using it the first time and after day 2 using 2x a day. I have very bad cystic acne and this has been the only thing I've ever used "over the counter" that works. Avoid under eyes because it does dry out that skin a bit but moisturizer helps greatly. I am so so so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kclanc

customer_reviews.title: My skin is in the worst shape ever.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to do little difference then got worse. Kept using it hoping it was just some sort of detox stage. Eventually I had bumps all over my face. When I stopped and went back to my original routine which never had me break out before my face has bumps all over even worse like it’s some sort of skin withdrawal. My face is worse than ever. Hopefully it goes back to normal. Update: They gave me a full refund. This product obviously works for most people just didn’t work for me. They are true to their guarantee which is awesome. I finally bite the bullet and went to a dermatologist. Hoping it works out.
customer_reviews.author: A. SmilingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Results, Even on Deep Acne!
customer_reviews.text: This system is amazing. My wife and I both struggle with acne, even though we are both in our mid-20s. The biggest issue is always those super deep, painful zits that seem impossible to cure! We have tried TONS of products, so decided to give this a try next. WOW. As soon as you do the process one time, you feel the difference. Your skin feels tightened, refreshed, and squeaky clean. And the best part is that we haven't had a SINGLE zit since beginning use. Yes, this even keeps away those deep-skin zits! Perfect product, amazing science. Not sure how it works but it does. Do yourself a favor and try it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this product, I do. Steps 2 and 3 feel great when you put them on, they dry super fast and you can wear make up over it, it doesn’t clump up and dries really smooth. Which is why I gave it 2 stars. However, it didn’t clear up my acne nor did it help it at all whatsoever. I’m dealing with a combination of hormonal acne/cystic acne and this just isn’t the product to do the job. So, on to the next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Terjesen

customer_reviews.title: Not for severe acne
customer_reviews.text: I've used acne products for years. I had high hopes for this kit, but it didn't stop my hormonal acne that happens once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jami A. Scurlock

customer_reviews.title: Neutralyze - the first product I've found that keeps my daughter's moderate acne at bay
customer_reviews.text: This is the first acne product I've found that has helped my daughter's acne. She has very stubborn acne, so it doesn't clear her skin completely, but it makes it manageable. Although there are 3 steps in the process to use the products, it is very clear how to use the products, and simple enough that my daughter uses it faithfully each morning and night. She's been using it for about a year now. It is also the one product that doesn't make her skin super dry and flaky. It also definitely helps minimize redness. Overall, this is a great product that I will continue to buy for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not really work for me. :(
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since the middle of May 2018 and it is now the end of June. I have not really noticed any big difference by using this product and sadly I still have some pimple breakouts since using this. I guess it is just now meant for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kai^2

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry your skin out and great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed a huge difference in about one week! My acne’s swelling and redness looks significantly better and hopefully will continue to get better as I keep using this product. I have never had a problem with acne until after my second baby, I have been looking everywhere for a product that helps. The three step system has been the one thing that has actually worked on my hormone acne. Family, friends and coworkers have even noticed and have been commenting on how good my skin looks!
customer_reviews.author: cecilia dalbec

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this might work for me. Well it didn’t. I used it as directed, 2 x a day for 8 weeks and my acne was the same. I think it dried the pimples quickly when they came but it didn’t necessarily help. I like the idea of it and it was easy to use though. Just know as with everything, it doesn’t work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: EggsandSam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Currently I been using Neutralyze 2 weeks and 4 days. I have noticed my acne has been healing quickly and I've seen improvements but I have continued to have new breakouts. I'm hoping with continuing use these breakouts will be come less frequent. My skin does feel softer and my complexion seems to have improved. I love that the products feel weightless on my skin and it's not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff for Adult Hormonal Acne
customer_reviews.text: This 3 step product has cleared up my jawline cystic adult acne. I am still working on my chin but with great results in less than a week on my jawline I think this product may be a winner. I am a lazy face washer so 3 steps was more than I was looking for...the steps are quick, easy & well worth caring for my skin properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eli G

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for all skin types /acne sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my teen nephew (16 y/o) who has severe acne. We did not see results as advertised within 2-3 days, 2 weeks, or 1 month. The product did not reduce redness nor eliminate acne scars /post acne scars. Overall it may work for some but definitely did not work well for him.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for over a month and I see no improvements - at first my skin broke out like crazy in the first weeks and I thought it would improve after the initial breakout but my skin progressively got worse. The cleanser is nice but the alcohol in step 2 makes it much too drying and is probably what worsened my skin.
customer_reviews.author: ValérieB.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE NEAUTRALYZE!
customer_reviews.text: The 3 step kit is the best. It leaves my skin silky smooth and clean feeling. It gets rid of blemishes fast! Customer service is great! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, it worked great for two weeks, then the acne line exploded. Stopped using it and skin cleared up right away
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie guiffre

customer_reviews.title: severe acne almost gone
customer_reviews.text: My son has been dealing with a bad case of severe acne, and we have tried EVERYTHING. From Proactiv, Murad, Paula's choice, Dermalogica, Exposed, and Nerd skincare. Nothing worked until Neutralyze. My son's acne is about 85% better than it used to be, I'd say from severe to mild. His scars are also decreasing. He's been using for around 60 days now, and can't wait to see what he looks like after a couple more months. Can't say enough about this product, it's seriously amazing and worked where all the others failed. My son looks like a totally different person and I am extremely grateful for this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Stopped my cystic acne. I also use their exfoliating pads and their renewal complex products. I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Kokenes

customer_reviews.title: Acne isn’t completely gone but much better. It is really important to wait that 3-5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Acne isn’t completely gone but much better. It is really important to wait that 3-5 minutes....that’s hard for a 13 year old.
customer_reviews.author: lane hardgrave

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: this trio certainly did as advertised. my skin cleared up within THREE days. T H R E E ??? honestly I wasn't expecting so much for something this reasonably priced. this product has changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin worse!!! I do not recommend this product for anyone with sensitive skin. It is better to use natural products like tea tree oil and/or bio oil. I regret purchasing this product, waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 32 and dry
customer_reviews.text: So I waited four weeks to give the product a chance to show its full force. Sadly enough it only worked the for the first two weeks. I suffer from rosacea acne and a few spots of comedones as a 32 year old female. Initially everything disappeared within days. Now. After four weeks. Very dry. Very bumpy. Very disappointed. Maybe it works for an extended time frame with the under 30 group.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used MANY products to try to help my son’s acne.....even very expensive doctor products...this is the first time in 3 years we have seen a difference...the trick though is every use....and he has very sensitive skin. In the tied round of using these products, it unfortunately seems that my son’s skin has gotten used to this product and it is not working as well....don’t know where to go next, but will. Keep trying with this product
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Acne
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 15 days and every time I use it I get more acne this product unfortunately I did not work
customer_reviews.author: Kenia lazo

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to get good acne treatment without a prescription. This did not work for my teenage daughter. We noticed no difference before and after use.
customer_reviews.author: twilli

customer_reviews.title: Get value great product
customer_reviews.text: You can see the difference instantly. Leaves face feeling clean without a sticky residue fresh scent not overbearing. Will continue to use.

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable improvement as of yet
customer_reviews.text: So far there has been no improvement in frequency of break outs and my pores still appear large. Will change review if I see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: I feel my skin is more soft and I have less pimples.
customer_reviews.text: This product make my skin feels really soft and no oil face . I think is working. I have been using couples days and I can feel the different in my face. I feel my skin is more soft and I have less pimples. This product doesn’t make my skin too dry and help me with my oil face , I like a lot because my face is a weird mix of both .
customer_reviews.author: Yissella More

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, and recently have struggled with Adult acne - this is the only wash/treatment that doesn't completely dry out my skin while addressing my issue (Like a lot of other acne products out there). I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Breebs

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works, just takes time
customer_reviews.text: All it takes is patience, don’t think that after applying this it will clear you the next morning, it takes a couple weeks to see some real progress. It’ll definitely be worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Marin

customer_reviews.title: Not what we hoped
customer_reviews.text: We are over 3 weeks of use- our son’s acne really has not changed. We are using all the steps everyday plus the pads after school as an “extra” treatment. We will finish the products and then try a new brand. We are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremi Olson

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I've battled hormonal/cystic acne. I gave the system 4 stars overall since its only been just over a month since I started using it. I have seen a significant difference when it comes to my cystic acne, it has prevented those huge lumps. I still am fighting off smaller pimples that tend to hang on but I CAN see an improvement. It doesn't dry out my skin at all and a little goes a long way. I will continue with this regimen in hopes to up the rating to 5 stars, until then I am happy but would like to be even happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: This acne system works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Neutralyze severe acne kit for one of my dearest, rather skeptically because it was so incredibly inexpensive. Within days her face was healing and looking healthy! It really has made a tremendous difference. After all the money spent on expensive, dermatologist-recommended items, this beats them all. Thank you for answering our prayers! We would definitely recommend this severe acne treatment system to anyone who needs help with their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one that my son's dermatologist recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My son had severe acne problem. He tried solutions that his dermatologist recommended. We paid $50 for one cream. Nothing worked, so we needed to try something before his acne got out of hand. I found this one with good reviews, so I ordered one. After a few weeks, his acne noticeably decreased in severity. Recently, I noticed that my son's acne started to come back after this item was depleted, so I just ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: Splendor

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my face would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Made my acne 10x worse. However, I did get a full refund. Worth a shot I guess if you have nothing else to lose. (I would suggest Curology).
customer_reviews.author: Britt L

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: use to get dermaclenz from obagi for my teenage son because he had acne but it is expensive I found this product and it works faster and its kept his face clear he is now 19 and this is all he uses I'm so happy I found this for my son he is so much confident with a clear face and it gets rid of redness- pigmentation of his acne recommend it dosen't hurt to try
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great so far for maskne!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for a couple weeks and have noticed a change in oil production, pore size, and blemishes for the better! I’ve always had combo skin but was starting to see maskne- and my chin has been a trouble zone. I’ve been using this 3-step process w the anti aging moisturizer and I love that moisturizer so far. Just be careful to layer a low oil sunscreen on top!! Looking forward to proving a review after another few months of consistent use!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I got a bad case of adult acne, with the cystic acne and blackheads. I tried this for a month, and it just didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Silent til I speak

customer_reviews.title: Helped When Nothing Else Would
customer_reviews.text: I have adult acne, hormonal acne, cystic acne, blackheads, you name it. These products together have helped almost everything, when nothing else has, and let me tell you, I've tried it all. Just can't get rid of my blackheads. But for me it is still a win to look in the mirror and not see painful acne popping up all over the place. Step 3 is a miracle product, it really does heal scars and severe acne. Definitely worth a try, just stick with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ellender

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt dry out your skin like other acne products
customer_reviews.text: After trying every otc acne treatment on the market we found this and with the fantastic reviews decided to give it a try for my son's moderate/severe acne. Unfortunately this was yet another product that didn't work for him. I think it's a good product it didn't dry his skin out like everything else we have used, I guess every product just works differently for different people, off to the dermatologist we go
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: better than proactive
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Neutralyze for my daughter for the past six months, definitely better than proactive. We tried it around the time when it came out on the market, I think. Her face cleared up after other products didn’t work and it has stayed that way throughout the entire time. If youre looking for an acne medication that actually works, I strongly recommend giving the Neutralyze acne kit a try! They also have really helpful customer service and are always accommodating whenever I contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wang

customer_reviews.title: Overall one of the better products in the market.
customer_reviews.text: This product helped decrease the duration and severity of my acne. My pimples dissapear quicker and I've had more success with this product than many others that I've tried. However it's not perfect and I still have a lot of acne scaring.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanlotion

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. It helped my wife with her face acne, she saw good progress after 1 week of use. Her acne was considerably reduced by the end of the month. The only thing with this product is the dryness of the skin...just be aware that you will feel that way, other than that everything OK. She used just once.
customer_reviews.author: José Adrián Parada Alba

customer_reviews.title: Quick Results
customer_reviews.text: I saw results within one day. And when I apply the product, I actually feel like it’s doing something. Love, love, love. > I get asked to review products often, including this one, but NEVER do it unless I find true value in it.
customer_reviews.author: JentleBiz

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay..
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cleared up my acne, but didn’t do anything for old acne scars like it claims. Also left my skin feeling oily afterwards, even washing morning and night. And it HAS to be used twice a day, miss a day and breakouts galore.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Long

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product caused my daughter to break out even worse.
customer_reviews.author: SProut

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenage acne!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son. I got him the 3 step system and the moisturizer. We’ve tried a few different products on his skin and haven’t really had many results. He’s been using this for about a month and there is a HUGE difference in his skin. The acne is just kind of subsiding and the tone of his skin is much smoother. He has teenage acne so finding something that works was important. I’m super happy with the results of these products. The other reviews are what ultimately motivated me to try it out so I wanted to review the product after my son used it for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: HelicopterMom

product_meta.title: Neutralyze Moderate To Severe Acne Treatment Kit 2.0 | Maximum Strength Acne Treatment System Includes Face Wash, Clearing Serum, Synergyzer + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology (60 Day)
product_meta.description:
Neutralyze Anti Acne Solution enhances your skin’s natural healing capabilities, rendering acne — and the inflammation and redness that accompany it — totally powerless. We’ve discovered the secret to treating moderate to severe acne: Advanced, science-inspired medicine to bring skin back to a neutral state of clear, calm, even-toned, glowing health — the ultimate Zen for troubled skin.

Based on multi-patented NITROGEN BOOST SKINCARE TECHNOLOGY, Neutralyze is the world's first acne treatment system to add the power of Nitric Oxide — clinically proven to noticeably improve moderate to severe acne within just a few days — no prescription needed. Finally, an acne solution that REALLY WORKS!

✔️ Neutralyze Moderate To Severe Acne Treatment System 2.0

✔️ Neutralyze Face Wash (5 oz) + Neutralyze Clearing Serum (1.5 oz) + Neutralyze Synergyzer (1.5 oz). 60 Day Supply.

✔️ Prescription grade 2% salicylic acid (B.H.A) + 1% mandelic acid (A.H.A.) + Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology

✔️ Clinical strength results without the doctor

✔️ Maximum effectiveness acne treatment kit

✔️ For cystic acne, pimples, blemishes, whiteheads, blackheads, acne scars and post acne marks

✔️ For teens and adults, men and women

✔️ For dry, oily or combination skin

✔️ For light, medium or dark skin tones

✔️ Non-comedogenic, sulfate-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, cruelty-free (never tested on animals)

✔️ Dermatologist recommended

✔️ cGMP/SOP compliant manufacturing facility, Made In USA

✔️ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

In a recent clinical study overseen by triple board-certified plastic surgeon Gregory W. Chernoff, M.D. F.R.C.S., Neutralyze was found to have a 95% effectiveness rate*. A majority of participants suffering from moderate to severe acne reported a noticeable improvement in their overall acne condition in as little as 24 hours!
feature_bullets: BREAKTHROUGH TREATMENT FOR MODERATE TO SEVERE ACNE - Clinically proven 95% effective. Neutralyze delivers amazing results, begin to see a noticeable improvement in as little as 24 hours. Maximum strength acne treatment kit, includes Neutralyze Face Wash (5 oz) + Neutralyze Clearing Serum (1.5 oz) + Neutralyze Synergyzer (1.5 oz). 60 Day Supply.

REDUCES REDNESS & IRRITATION TO VISIBLY IMPROVE COMPLEXION - Neutralyze is based on multi-patented Nitrogen Boost Skincare Technology: The world's first acne solution to add the power of Nitric Oxide, which promotes skin healing to help get rid of acne quickly.

EFFECTIVE ON VARIOUS ACNE RELATED & OTHER SKIN ISSUES - Eliminates cystic acne, pimples, zits, blemishes, whiteheads, blackheads, acne scars and post acne marks. Also helps relieve other skin conditions such as rosacea, eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis, and keratosis pilaris. Save time and money using this all-in-one acne treatment system + skincare regimen.

FADES DARK SPOTS & CORRECTS UNEVEN SKIN TONE - Our advanced, science-inspired anti acne formulations contain prescription grade 2% salicylic acid (BHA) and 1% mandelic acid (AHA) to gently exfoliate skin and help correct blotchiness. Keeps pores clean to prevent future breakouts + reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, revealing youthful and attractive skin.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If you’re not happy with your results, email us directly for a refund. Neutralyze is dermatologist recommended for the treatment of acne vulgaris. Made in USA, certified cGMP/SOP compliant facility. Neutralyze contains no parabens, sulfates, or fragrances. All products manufactured by Kantian Skincare LLC are 100% cruelty-free, never tested on animals. **DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN OR IF YOU ARE ALLERGIC TO PRODUCTS CONTAINING AHA/BHA**
